scenario.name: Abort BYE no rrs
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:uac@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Length: 0

ACK [last_Request_URI] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port][peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:uac@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Length: 0
